title: "Unspecific error occurred. Please check the logs for more information." Please help!
body:
I have been trying to fix my League client on and off again for 3 weeks, i don't know much about it so i looked up several different fixes for this. I've reinstalled league, completely removed it from my computer then reinstalled it, I've completely removed it, turned off my computer, then reinstalled it. I have installed the Hextech Repair tool and used it to force re-patch, then reinstall, then both, twice. 

I've been having my desire to play league unsatisfied and its rather annoying. I've even deleted specific folders in the RADS projects folder. Every time the update gets to 33%-99%. (Any number in between, often its around 70%-78%, but occasionally goes to 99% before showing the error) I don't know really anything about the logs i'm supposed to check for information. 

When i look at the Patcher logs it says "|   OKAY| " beside a bunch of things which i assume means its working fine. but then it gets near the bottom and says "|  ERROR|" beside a bunch near the bottom, Ill paste all the "|  ERROR|" messages in here in case it could help. 

006170.059|  ERROR| Riot::RADS::FileSystem::CRT::fopen_s: Input/output error

006170.059|  ERROR| Riot::RADS::FileSystem::CRT::fopen_s: ("C:/Riot Games/League of Legends/RADS/projects/lol_game_client/releases/0.0.1.110/deploy/League of Legends.exe", "rb") failed: Permission denied

006170.059|  ERROR| Riot::RADS::Common::MD5Helper::ComputeMD5: Error 0x80070006: The handle that was passed to the API has been either invalidated or closed.

006170.059|  ERROR| Riot::RADS::Common::MD5Helper::ComputeMD5: Failed opening C:/Riot Games/League of Legends/RADS/projects/lol_game_client/releases/0.0.1.110/deploy/League of Legends.exe

006170.060|  ERROR| Riot::RADS::Patching::UpdateAndInstallShared::CheckFile: C:/jenkins/workspace/rads-code-win-release/code/Solutions/RiotRADS/Source/RADS/Patching/Install/UpdateAndInstallShared.cpp(522): Found the file "C:/Riot Games/League of Legends/RADS/projects/lol_game_client/releases/0.0.1.110/deploy/League of Legends.exe", but failed to compute MD5.

006170.065|  ERROR| Riot::RADS::Patching::UpdateAndInstallShared::`anonymous-namespace'::ExtractDownloadResult: C:/jenkins/workspace/rads-code-win-release/code/Solutions/RiotRADS/Source/RADS/Patching/Install/UpdateAndInstallShared.cpp(222): Error validating file after download: 'C:/Riot Games/League of Legends/RADS/projects/lol_game_client/releases/0.0.1.110/deploy/League of Legends.exe'

006170.065|  ERROR| Riot::RADS::Patching::UpdateAndInstallShared::`anonymous-namespace'::ConsumeDownloadManager: C:/jenkins/workspace/rads-code-win-release/code/Solutions/RiotRADS/Source/RADS/Patching/Install/UpdateAndInstallShared.cpp(103): File callback failed for '/releases/live/projects/lol_game_client/releases/0.0.1.110/files/League of Legends.exe'

006267.325|  ERROR| Riot::RADS::Patching::InstallProjectReleaseOperation::InternalExecute: C:/jenkins/workspace/rads-code-win-release/code/Solutions/RiotRADS/Source/RADS/Patching/Install/InstallProjectRelease.cpp(682): Download files step failed

006267.402|  ERROR| Riot::RADS::Patching::InstallSolutionReleaseImpl::Execute::Execute: C:/jenkins/workspace/rads-code-win-release/code/Solutions/RiotRADS/Source/RADS/Patching/Install/InstallSolutionRelease.cpp(454): Execution step failed

006267.403|  ERROR| Riot::RADS::Patching::InstallSolutionRelease: C:/jenkins/workspace/rads-code-win-release/code/Solutions/RiotRADS/Source/RADS/Patching/Install/InstallSolutionRelease.cpp(507): InstallSolutionRelease failed

006267.423|  ERROR| Riot::RADS::FileSystem::CRT::fopen_s: No such file or directory

006267.423|  ERROR| Riot::RADS::FileSystem::CRT::fopen_s: ("C:/Riot Games/League of Legends/RADS/temp/patching/TMP3a724.tmp", "rb") failed: No such file or directory

006267.423|  ERROR| Riot::RADS::FileSystem::CRTThrows::fopen: No such device or address

006267.423|  ERROR| Riot::RADS::FileSystem::CRTThrows::fopen: (C:/Riot Games/League of Legends/RADS/temp/patching/TMP3a724.tmp, rb)

006267.432|  ERROR| Riot::RADS::FileSystem::Impl::ArchiveFileBuilder::Write: C:/jenkins/workspace/rads-code-win-release/code/Solutions/RiotRADS/Source/RADS/FileSystem/ArchiveFileBuilder.cpp(317): Error while writing archive file (C:/Riot Games/League of Legends/RADS/temp/TMP70ca8.tmp, 0x057FD830)

006267.433|  ERROR| Riot::RADS::FileSystem::Impl::Manager::WriteArchiveFile: C:/jenkins/workspace/rads-code-win-release/code/Solutions/RiotRADS/Source/RADS/FileSystem/Manager.cpp(544): Failed to write archive file "C:/Riot Games/League of Legends/RADS/temp/TMP70ca8.tmp"

006267.433|  ERROR| Riot::RADS::FileSystem::Impl::Manager::WriteArchiveFiles: C:/jenkins/workspace/rads-code-win-release/code/Solutions/RiotRADS/Source/RADS/FileSystem/Manager.cpp(446): Failed to write an archive

006267.433|  ERROR| Riot::RADS::Patching::ManagedFs::Flush: C:/jenkins/workspace/rads-code-win-release/code/Solutions/RiotRADS/Source/RADS/Patching/Utils/ManagedFileHelper.cpp(381): Failed to write out archive files

006267.489|  ERROR| Riot::RADS::Patching::InstallProjectReleaseOperation::~InstallProjectReleaseOperation: C:/jenkins/workspace/rads-code-win-release/code/Solutions/RiotRADS/Source/RADS/Patching/Install/InstallProjectRelease.cpp(628): unexpected_shutdown

006267.491|  ERROR| Riot::RADS::Patching::UpdateSolution: C:/jenkins/workspace/rads-code-win-release/code/Solutions/RiotRADS/Source/RADS/Patching/Install/UpdateSolution.cpp(682): Failed to InstallSolutionRelease

006267.491|  ERROR| Riot::LoLLauncherLib::`anonymous-namespace'::InstallLatestSolutionRelease: C:/jenkins/workspace/rads-code-win-release/code/Solutions/RiotRADS/Source/RADS/LoLPatcherLib/UpdateWorker.cpp(206): Failure or interruption while updating

006267.492|   OKAY| Riot::LoLLauncherLib::AddProjectUpdateMetrics: project_update_metrics_internal_message_identifier : game - Update Time 1541.7 sec, Downloaded 4029000274 Bytes, Avg 2613266 BytesPerSec. Result: failure.     

(Gonna leave this one cause it says "Result: failure.")

006267.492|  ERROR| Riot::LoLLauncherLib::UpdateWorker::DoUpdateGame: C:/jenkins/workspace/rads-code-win-release/code/Solutions/RiotRADS/Source/RADS/LoLPatcherLib/UpdateWorker.cpp(471): Failed to install latest game client.

006267.497|  ERROR| Riot::LoLLauncherLib::ThreadedPatcherWorker::HandleUpdate: c:/jenkins/workspace/rads-code-win-release/code/solutions/riotrads/source/rads/lolpatcherlib/PatcherWorker.inl(75): Worker update failed (RIOT_HRESULT=80004005, complete=yes)

(I have also tried switching servers but same problem)

Could someone please tell me how to fix my client. 
{{item:3070}} _ {{item:3070}}

replies.body:
Once your patcher get's passed the 33% mark, it starts to download all the new files it needs. When you see an unspecified error after that, it's a good tip that your network is having a hard time being able to download everything from our servers. 

Look over our [**Connection Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for some ways we can get you set up with a more stable connection!

I plugged in an internet cord and still did not work, i don't know how else to improve my internet connection. Its not like i have bad connection with wifi either, my computer sits right beside the router. I dont think i mentioned when this problem started though, the computer was updating to the latest patch but the visuals messed up and it was mostly a black small rectangle so i Alt+F4'd cause i was going to play a different game with a friend anyway and he said to just Alt+F4 it and come back to it later. That is when this problem began.  Also with the internet cord plugged in it stopped at 99% and said the same thing "unspecified error occurred" is there any other thing i could do that might fix it?

Ahhhhh if you force closed something while it was updating there might still be corrupted files that are throwing that unspecified error. I think it'd be best to give you a more one on one help, so reach out to us in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so that we can dig a little deeper.
i have  The same problem plz help
